statement.name: INSERT_SMAQNT
statement.sql: INSERT INTO SMAQNT(CODQNT, CODCIA, CODBKO, NROQNT, TITQNT, TPOPTE, SLDQNT, TPOQNT, NRORCB, NROCMP, NROPQK, CRDQNT, FCHQNT, OBSQNT, FILQNT, RSTQNT, RSVQNT, RQPQNT, SLIQNT, CSCCHQ, CODPTE, SQLBKR, STDQNT) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?,?, ?)

statement.name: UPDATE_SMAQNT
statement.desc: Actualizar registro de la tabla cuentas bancarias
statement.sql: UPDATE SMAQNT SET CODBKO = ?, NROQNT = ?, TITQNT = ?, TPOPTE = ?, SLDQNT = ?, TPOQNT = ?, CODPTE = ?, NROPQK = ?, CRDQNT = ?, FCHQNT = ?, FILQNT = ?, RSTQNT = ?, RQPQNT = ? , STDQNT = ? WHERE CODQNT = ?

statement.name: DELETE_SMAQNT
statement.desc: Eliminar registro de la tabla cuentas bancarias
